extracted_information: The H-1B Employer Data Hub provides downloadable data files in Excel and CSV formats. These files contain information on employers who have submitted petitions to employ H-1B nonimmigrant workers. Data is available from fiscal year 2009 through fiscal year 2025 (quarter 2).

features.name: Data Source
features.details: Employers who have submitted petitions to employ H-1B nonimmigrant workers

features.name: Decision Information
features.details: First decisions USCIS makes on petitions for initial and continuing employment

data_fields.identifier_details: Employers are identified by the last four digits of their tax identification.

download_instructions: Select Excel or CSV file type.
